title: California AI Safety Bill Vetoed

summary:
Hereâ€™s a quick list of some of my favourite films to watch during this, the most spooky of seasons (in no particular order):

Fear Street (Part One, Part Two, Part Three) - an excellent slasher trilogy, released simultaneously on Netflix
Killer Klowns from Outer Space - So bad, so fun
Halloween (1978) - Requires no explanation
Grave Encounters - Probably my favourite found-footage film, a touch dated now but still creepy
Haunt - Taking a common formula and just doing it really well
Evil Dead II
Talk To Me - I actually struggled to sleep after this
Trick 'r Treat - Halloween-themed anthology film with some excellent segments
Halloweentown - Surprisingly well-done for a Disney Channel movie, an annual staple in our house
The Haunting of Hill House - Okay, not a film, but some of the most expertly-crafted horror Iâ€™ve ever watched
title: My favourite films for October
